data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Maniema.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maniema, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Maniema.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 119 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Maniema, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Maniema.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Maniema, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Maniema, Democratic Republic of the Congo by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Maniema to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.focus_label: Maniema, Democratic Republic of the Congo

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Maniema who will make disciples who make disciples.

location.full_name: Maniema, Democratic Republic of the Congo
